tool_description: Monapi's digital assets API enables business to automate lookup Real Time Reputation for any given IPv4. Get Threat Classification, Geo Location & more Data in one API Call. Devs can use this API to reduce undesirable signups, localize IPs and Domains, reduce Fraud, secure Deployment Pipelines and so much more! Join our secure your App Movement and enjoy build in security.
name: IP Anomaly Detection
title: IP Anomaly Detection

api_list.name: Get IP Anomaly Data
api_list.description: Returns Threat & Geolocation Data for a given IPv4 Address

api_list.name: Get Domain Anomaly Data
api_list.description: Get Threat Intel Data for given Domain. Does it was seen in any blacklists, belong to a disposable Mailprovider, has blacklisted mail- or nameserver in one Call.
